pageProduct.name: Aptamil Essensis Organic A2 Protein Milk 3 Premium Toddler Nutritional Supplement From 1 Year 900g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Information

General Information

Aptamil Essensis 3 Premium Toddler Nutritional Supplement is our most exclusive organic A2 protein milk formulation*:


  • Unique patented synbiotic blend
  • Organic A2 protein milk sourced from certified organic farms in New Zealand
  • Contains organic milk fat

    • *Within the Danone and Nutricia ANZ range
    Certified Organic By AsureQuality Limited

    Aptamil Essensis 3 Premium Toddler Nutritional Supplement combines our unique patented synbiotic blend with organic A2 protein milk, making it our most exclusive formulation to help build strong foundations for your toddler's future.

    • Patented synbiotic blend^, containing a unique probiotic Bifidobacterium breve M-16V
    • Zinc, necessary for normal immune system function*
    • Iodine, iron and zinc to contribute to normal cognitive function*
    • Contains organic A2 protein milk and organic milk fat sourced from certified organic farms in New Zealand
    • Suitable for toddlers from 1 year whose nutritional intake may be inadequate
    • Product manufactured and certified organic in New Zealand
    • Scan QR code on the bottom of the can for product tracing
    • 900g tin format


    ^Refer to ingredients
    *When consumed as part of a healthy and varied diet and is prepared as directed
    Certified Organic By AsureQuality

    Size: 900g

    Warnings

    Formulated supplementary food for young children. Specially designed to supplement the normal dietary needs of toddlers when their intakes of energy and nutrients may not be adequate.

    Dental Hygiene: Encourage your toddler to drink from a cup from 1 year and to drink water regularly. Take your child for a dental visit regularly.

    Do not use if foil security seal is damaged or missing.

    Ingredients

    Organic milk solids, organic vegetable oils (emulsifier (organic soy lecithin), antioxidant (natural tocopherols (soy))), organic short chaingalacto-oligosaccharides (milk), organic milk fat, dried omega LCPUFAs (fish oil, antioxidant (sodium ascorbate, natural tocopherols(soy))), long chain fructo-oligosaccharides, potassium citrate, Bifidobacterium breve M-16V.

    Minerals: Calcium, phosphorus, magnesium, iron, zinc, iodine.

    Vitamins: Vitamins (A, B1, B3, B6, B12, C, D3, E), folic acid.

    Contains: Contains: cows' milk, fish and soy.

    Allergen Contains: Fish| Milk| Soy

    Directions

    Feeding Guide -
    Age: From 1 year,
    Safe drinking water: 120mL,
    Level scoops of powder*: 4,
    Number of feeds per day: 3-4.

    *1 scoop = 5.0g of powder. NOTE: 1 scoop of powder added to 30mL of water yields approximately 34mL of toddler nutritional supplement. This feeding guide is a general guide ONLY; your child may need more or less than shown.

    PREPARATION INSTRUCTIONS

    1. Wash hands before preparing one serve. Wash and rinse cup and all utensils thoroughly.

    2. Using the scoop enclosed, fill the scoop lightly and level off using the built-in leveller.

    3. Add 4 level scoops of powder to 120mL of safe drinking water. For smaller volumes simply add 1 scoop to each 30mL of water. Whisk, shake or stir briskly to dissolve powder. Serve immediately, or for a cold drink, chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour before serving. For a warm drink, heat water slightly before adding powder and serving. Discard unfinished drinks.

    Prepare each drink separately. It is safer to use Aptamil Essensis Toddler Nutritional Supplement immediately after it is prepared.

    STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

    Store in a cool dry place. Use by the date on container bottom. After opening, keep container airtight and use contents within four weeks.

    Product is packed by weight, not volume. Some settling of the powder may occur during transportation and distribution.

    RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

    Recycle

    Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
